output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# read in packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

# read in processed spatial data
```{r}
spdata_main <- read_csv(here("data", "processed", "spatialdata_01_main.csv"))
```

# data wrangling

Remove clean-up data from the year 2020.
```{r}
spdata_no2020 <- spdata_main %>% 
  filter(cleanup_date >= as.Date('2020-01-01') & cleanup_date <= as.Date('2020-12-31'))
```








# save dataframe as spatialdata_02_no2020.csv
```{r}
write_csv(spdata_no2020, here("data", "processed", "spatialdata_02_no2020.csv"))
```
